Replace.Text: We accept your noble soul.
Don't rush it out.
The Lateran citizens recognize your feats, please accept our friendship.
Thank you, my friend.
We respect your choice.
Sankta's firearms will guard Rutland for thousands of years.
Even if repeatedly tolerated, but by the Law, you so evil people is doomed to be eradicated by us.
We might fail, but the Law is always there.
The good fight, l have finished, should do the road l have done, when his faith l hold on to. From now on,the crown of righteousness has retained for us.
Thanks for your visit, they will receive the highest specification hospitality from Lateran Citizens.
Laterano cannot accept any potential evil person.
My Apostolic Nuncios have brought fine firearms, scepters, and Lateran's native desserts to visit your country.
Even a soul as despicable as you, also deserves a redemption at all.
Even the Law, will not tolerant your crimes against the Terra! [NEWLINE](Denounces You)
Hello, I am Pope Yvangelista XI, the agent of the Sankta, the Laterano, and the Law. Also the creator of the Apostolic Nuncios of all nations. May we coexist peacefully.
After a tiring journey, we can take your team to the holy city for a rest, and perhaps even catch the dinner at the Lateran Basilica.
Never thought there to be such a great country on this unfamiliar land.
Our Apostolic Nuncios is fully ready, hoping to exchange and learn from your messenger.
May the Law be with you.
Even if you're not the chosen one, I can still see its radiance in you.
(You maintain peace and recruit talented individuals.)
Don't forget your people. Your incompetence and incompetence will eventually be despised by them.
(You have disrupted world peace.)
Please follow the Law and save the Terra with the Sakotas and Lateran.
Although arbitrary decisions are usually not accepted, I believe that both the citizens of Lateran and the Law are seeking for a peace.
You are the sinner of all the Terra, and you must be eliminated no matter what.
Let's put aside our hostility and face the common crisis of the Terra.
Don't betray Sakota's trust.
We cannot take this risk.
The messengers have no ill intentions and are only running around for the future of the Terra. We hope you can open border for them.
Move your army away, don't expect to paint the white walls of the millennium holy city with blood.
This is an absolute good deed.
I feel very sorry.
Yvangelista XI recognizes your way of governance
Yvangelista XI believes that you are confused and unclear
Well, of course we won't reject the friendship of our friends, and we hope to carry out further business cooperation.
Ah, although you can be called our friend, we don't quite get along yet.
Our friars sisters all hope to cooperate with you. Please accept our friendship.
Thank you so much~
Uh, what's wrong?
Strings have three choices, while enemies have three hardships.
The battle has begun, let's witness the outstanding tactical literacy of Landen Monastery!
Failed, it's a pity. Is the monastery really just a facade?
The battle beyond the high wall. Is it really that cruel?
Okay, thank you for the visiting delegation from your country. The monks will take good care of them.
Although your delegation was carefully prepared, they have little in common with the Lateran people and cannot raise a toast with us.
Girls of the monastery brought soft bread and fragrant beer, which we baked and brewed ourselves!
Hmph, don't think the tactics of Landen Monastery are just fancy.
Your beliefs are completely different from Lateran. Before we point our arrows at you, please change your mind quickly![NEWLINE](Denounces You)
Hello, Hildegard Archetto, a friar under the Landen Monastery, hopes to collaborate with you in the future to rebuild the renowned Landen Monastery.
Nice to meet new potential partners! Please come and visit Lande Monastery first, we have prepared freshly brewed malt liquor!
Mmm, thank you so much!
Lateran City is located between fertile plains. Can you tell me about your capital?
May God bless you, hello.
Your people live happily and your creations are well-known. hey! I'm really happy for you!
(Your city is thriving and developing.)
Hey, how will your people face their future life in such poverty and backwardness?
(Your city is underdeveloped.)
I will sincerely pray for you. May the sound of the bell dispel illness and misfortune, and may faith illuminate the path ahead. Please join me in forging an alliance that benefits all without harm!
Hmph, I'll accept your peace for now. Don't forget the power of Landen tactics!
The arrow has been wound, the next step is to completely eliminate the enemy!
May the bell of the monastery keep ringing, I think you are also waiting for the sound of peace.
Don't betray our trust.
Um I refuse it!
Mmm, friars would like to pass your territory, would you agree?
We have seen your army eyeing us closely, and the Landen Guard is ready!
New business contract! This is really amazing!
Um Okay, we will design a more reasonable contract.
Hildegard Archetto is delighted that your city is thriving and developing
Hildegard Archetto hates your poor and backward development status
A friend... I will accept you as a new friend, but remember, friends cannot break the rules either.
What I need is a common executor, not new uncertain factors.
You have absolute independent judgment ability, come with me and guard the rules.
Okay, let's work together to ensure the correctness of the rules.
Fine, an acceptable result.
Destruction is the simplest behavior.
The Law will not counterattack the destroyer, and I will execute your destruction on its behalf!
The Law has lost its essence, I have failed.
I have failed, your combat skills deserve your victory.
We welcome your delegation, who will attend a grand church dinner after registering at the atrium notary office.
No need.
My delegation has brought you Ambrosius' flowers and Lateran native specialty desserts.
Don't let hatred blind your rationality.
You have no respect for the Law, and the arrival of a fair judgment is only a matter of time. [NEWLINE](Denounces You)
Federico Giallo, The legal professional executor of the Lateran Notarial Hall, currently a "Saint" personally appointed by the Lateran Pope, is pleased to meet you.
Lateran City is located nearby, please follow us to the Notarial Hall to rest for a while.
Thank you for sharing your information, it is beneficial for us.
Let's exchange the existing strategic information. Lateran City is our holy city, where is your capital?
Hello, do you have any needs?
The Law is above, and we will all be blessed by it. You have done a great job.
(You accepted his religion.)
Heathens like you will not receive the grace of the Law.
(You believe different religions from them.)
Perhaps we should form an alliance and seek common development.
The cost of repeatedly breaking rules is gradually increasing, and you should learn from this lesson.
Your destruction is necessary to uphold the Law.
I believe that peace is a mutually acceptable outcome for both parties.
Just take actions.
This is not in our interest.
My troops hope to pass through your territory, and we guarantee that we will not cause any losses to you.
Assault may be a reasonable combat technique, but it is already within our considerations.
Thanks.
What a pity.
Federico thinks you are a believer
Federico thinks you are a heretic
I can feel the stiffness of your fingers, it seems that you are not used to this kind of relationship yet. Don't be nervous, I will take you with me
If you want to become friends with me, what you have done now is far from enough.
Even without relying on the connection of the music, you still understand me more and more. But how can I share the joy in my heart with you?
You are indeed the person who understands my inner voice the most
How can I convey my emotions to you?
War itself is not worth playing. But I will listen to every voice on the battlefield, whether they come from heroes or refugees.
I am not interested in the means of harming others, but you are an irresistible temptation to me.
The song ends and the people disperse. How long can the vibration of the strings last after the performance is over?
No matter how strong the soul is, it cannot conquer the destined extinction. But since you have conquered me, I expect you to have a different performance.
I will prepare a unique concert for them.
I've heard too much noise already... Can you please let me be quiet for a while?
They cannot play music like mine, but they are equally skilled. I hope you are satisfied.
Even if it's your request, I won't stop playing. Trauma is one thing, freedom is another. My life, like any other life, will come to an end once it stagnates.
Would you also refuse to listen to the most genuine voice?[NEWLINE](Denounces You)

The sinner of Lateran, later a saint, a guest of honor to the nobles of Leithanien, Alturo. I should have introduced myself through music. Unfortunately, it may be impolite to play for you rashly, so please forgive me for my cumbersome self introduction.
Perhaps our own distance should be closer, don't you think?
In this way, the distance between us has been further increased.
Do you want to know my recent residence? I can tell you. But you also need to tell me.
The strings are vibrating. All for you.
Follow your heart, let me play for them
(You have a high yields of Faith and Culture.)
I refuse to play for you, even to listen to the sound of your inner heart.
(Your Culture and Faith yields are low.)
No one has ever walked into my music and thoughts like you. Since that's the case, why don't you take my hand and move forward together?
I would rather play the cloud drifting across the sky than war.
You haven't satisfied me yet
Don't you think it's time to stop this absurd play?
Be careful, I don't want your army to get lost in the music while passing by.
Sorry, their voices are too loud.
Please don't misunderstand, we were just passing by.
Your army's voice doesn't attract me as much as yours, please let them leave.
The strings are playing, to thank you
(Noise) Unfortunately.
Arturia recognizes your significant yields of Faith and Culture
Arturia hates you for ignoring yields of faith and Culture
I accept your friendship on behalf of all we Apostolic Nuncios.
No, I refuse, I only do what I should do.
I hope you are a trustworthy person like Mostima, please accept my friendship.
I won't break the existing order and my own beliefs for you, but I am still willing to walk with you.
Well, maybe you need to be more focused.
I don't like destruction unless it's necessary.
The battle has begun, keep an eye on it, don't make any mistakes.
Failure is always difficult to accept.
I have been to many places and witnessed many sceneries. I have failed, but got no regrets or need for sympathy.
An envoy to other messengers? Strange, but welcome.
Boring.
The Apostolic Nuncios brought bullet hazelnut sticks, this is My... no, the Pope's favorite dessert, and I hope you will like it too.
Unlike 'teaching' Mostima, I will truly teach you a lesson.
You are a sinner of Lateran, and even more so of the world![NEWLINE](Denounces You)
Fiameta, senior commissioner of the Lateran Notarial Hall, working together with my partner Mostima.
The journey has been tough, why don't we sit down at our notary office, have some tea, have some desserts, and slowly communicate.
Thank you for sharing, the messengers will come and take a look.
The notary office believes that exchanging capital information is a good transaction.
Hope that you are well.
Thank you for staying away from these city states. Let the turbulent political struggles be handled by my Apostolic Nuncios.
(You did not compete the city-states with her.)
It is the responsibility of Apostolic Nuncios to communicate with these city-states, do not interfere.
(You compete the city-state with her.)
I hope we can pursue common beliefs and goals together. Would you be willing to accept our alliance?
That's all for now, I don't want to make any bigger noise.
Too late to stop now.
I don't want to engage in meaningless disputes anymore, especially those that are destined to be mutually damaging.
As long as you don't disturb us, please go ahead.
No, you should pay a sufficient price.
Our Apostolic Nuncios expect to pass through your territory.
Declare war or withdraw your army, don't procrastinate.
Thank you.
I deeply regret this.
Fiammetta is pleased that you have not expanded your influence
Fiammetta is not satisfied with your interference in the competition of city-states
